verses.verse: And the whole earth <S%H776><s%> was of one <S%H259><s%> language <S%H8193><s%> and of one <S%H259><s%> speech <S%H1697><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5265><s%>, as they journeyed east <S%H6924><s%>, that they found <S%H4672><s%> a plain <S%H1237><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%>; and they dwelt there <S%H3427><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H3051><s%> another <S%H7453><s%>, Come <S%H3051><s%>, let us make <S%H3835><s%> brick <S%H3843><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> them thoroughly <S%H8316><s%>. And they had brick <S%H3843><s%> for stone <S%H68><s%>, and slime <S%H2564><s%> had they for mortar <S%H1961><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H3051><s%>, let us build <S%H1129><s%> us a city <S%H5892><s%>, and a tower <S%H4026><s%>, whose top <S%H7218><s%> may reach unto heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and let us make <S%H6213><s%> us a name <S%H8034><s%>; lest we be scattered abroad <S%H6327><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the tower <S%H4026><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> builded <S%H1129><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H259><s%>, they are one people <S%H5971><s%>, and they have all one <S%H259><s%> language <S%H8193><s%>; and this is what they begin <S%H2490><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>: and now nothing <S%H3808><s%> will be withholden <S%H1219><s%> from them <S%H2161><s%>, which they purpose to do <S%H6213><s%>.

Come <S%H3051><s%>, let us go down <S%H3381><s%>, and there confound <S%H1101><s%> their language <S%H8193><s%>, that <S%H834><s%> they may not understand <S%H8085><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another <S%H7453><s%>'s speech <S%H8193><s%>.

So Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> scattered them abroad <S%H6327><s%> from thence <S%H8033><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: and they left off <S%H2308><s%> building <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Therefore was the name of it <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Babel <S%H894><s%>; because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> did there confound <S%H1101><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: and from thence did <S%H6327><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> scatter them abroad <S%H6327><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

These are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>. Shem <S%H8035><s%> was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> two years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%>:

and Shem <S%H8035><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Shelah <S%H7974><s%>:

and Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Shelah <S%H7974><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Shelah <S%H7974><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Eber <S%H5677><s%>:

and Shelah <S%H7974><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Eber <S%H5677><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Eber <S%H5677><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> four <S%H702><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Peleg <S%H6389><s%>:

and Eber <S%H5677><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Peleg <S%H6389><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Peleg <S%H6389><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Reu <S%H7466><s%>:

and Peleg <S%H6389><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Reu <S%H7466><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Reu <S%H7466><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Serug <S%H8286><s%>:

and Reu <S%H7466><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Serug <S%H8286><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Serug <S%H8286><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Nahor <S%H5152><s%>:

and Serug <S%H8286><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Nahor <S%H5152><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Nahor <S%H5152><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%>:

and Nahor <S%H5152><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and nineteen <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
And Terah <S%H8646><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, Nahor <S%H5152><s%>, and Haran <S%H2039><s%>.

Now these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Terah <S%H8646><s%>. Terah <S%H8646><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, Nahor <S%H5152><s%>, and Haran <S%H2039><s%>; and Haran <S%H2039><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%>.

And Haran <S%H2039><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of his nativity <S%H4138><s%>, in Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees <S%H3778><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> and Nahor <S%H5152><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them wives <S%H802><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> was Sarai <S%H8297><s%>; and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Haran <S%H2039><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, and the father <S%H1><s%> of Iscah <S%H3252><s%>.
And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> was barren <S%H6135><s%>; she had no child <S%H2056><s%>.

And Terah <S%H8646><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Lot <S%H3876><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haran <S%H2039><s%>, his son <S%H1121><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, and Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law, his son <S%H1121><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>; and they went forth <S%H3318><s%> with them from Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees <S%H3778><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> unto Haran <S%H2771><s%>, and dwelt there <S%H3427><s%>.
And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Terah <S%H8646><s%> were two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and Terah <S%H8646><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in Haran <S%H2771><s%>.
